Token.Abstract: An RKConnectionTestExpectation object defines an expectation that a Core Data relationship is connected during the execution of a RKMappingTest. These expectation are used to unit test a connection specified via an RKConnectionDescription object.
Creates and returns a connection expectation for the specified relationship name, attributes dictionary, and value.

Parameter.Name: relationshipName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the relationship expected to be connected.

Parameter.Name: attributes
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary specifying the attributes that are expected to be used to establish the connection.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value that is expected to be set for the relationship when the connection is established.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A newly constructed connection expectation, initialized with the given relationship name, attributes dictionary, and expected value.

Token.Abstract: Initializes the receiver with the given relationship name, attributes dictionary, and value.

Parameter.Name: relationshipName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the relationship expected to be connected.

Parameter.Name: attributes
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary specifying the attributes that are expected to be used to establish the connection.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value that is expected to be set for the relationship when the connection is established.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given relationship name, attributes dictionary, and expected value.

Token.Abstract: The name of the relationship that is expected to be connected. Cannot be nil.
The name of the relationship that is expected to be connected. Cannot be nil.
The dictionary of attributes that are expected to be used when the connection is established. May be nil.
The dictionary of attributes that are expected to be used when the connection is established. May be nil.
The value that is expected to be set for the relationship when connected. May be nil.
The value that is expected to be set for the relationship when connected. May be nil.
Returns a string summary of the connection that is expected to be established.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string describing the expected connection.
